description.value:
Requires Half Action and Concentration. Poor: detect heat, radiation, EM or Daemonic Taint withiin 20 metres, can only do one, may get overwhelmed by excessive concentrations of detections. Common: acts as normal handheld Auspex. Good: acts as normal handheld Auspex and can reroll perception tests using its functions.

Effect: Rare / Initiated

Notes: 1000 T 15 R
description.summary: Requires Half Action and Concentration. Poor: detect heat, radiation, EM or Daemonic Taint withiin 20 metres, can only do one, may get overwhelmed by excessive concentrations of detections. Common: ac
